Container.Name: Pocket-ID
Container.Overview: A simple OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services. v2 with mandatory encryption key support.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port to access the Pocket-ID web interface.

Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: The public URL where Pocket-ID will be accessed. Must be HTTPS for passkeys to work. Example: https://id.yourdomain.com

Config.Name: Encryption Key
Config.Description: REQUIRED in v2. Key used to encrypt sensitive data including private keys. Must be at least 16 characters. Generate in terminal with: openssl rand -base64 32

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Set to true when running behind a reverse proxy (Pangolin, SWAG, etc). Ensures correct client IP detection.

Config.Name: Maxmind License Key
Config.Description: Optional. License key for GeoLite2 database to show IP locations in audit logs. Get a free key at maxmind.com.

Config.Name: Disable UI Configuration
Config.Description: If true, app settings can only be changed via environment variables, not through the web UI.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Persistent data directory for database, uploads, and configuration.

Config.Name: Database Connection String
Config.Description: SQLite: just a file path (e.g. data/pocket-id.db). PostgreSQL: full connection string (e.g. postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/dbname). Provider is auto-detected.

Config.Name: Upload Path
Config.Description: Path inside the container where uploaded files (logos etc) are stored.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal port the server listens on. Should match the container port mapping. Do not change unless you know what you are doing.

Config.Name: Internal Host
Config.Description: Internal host binding. Do not change.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions. Default 99 = nobody on Unraid.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions. Default 100 = users on Unraid.
